mapper.sql: select r_book_no , count(r_book_no) as viewCnt from web_app_test2.tb_comic_book_view group by r_book_no
mapper.select:
/* 전체 만화책 개수 조회 쿼리 */
select count(*) from web_app_test2.tb_comic_book where use_yn = 'y'

/* 메인 만화책 리스트 조회 쿼리 */ select tb_c_b.r_book_no as comicBookNo , tb_c_b.title as comicBookTitle , tb_c_b.author as comicBookAuthor , tb_c_b.link as link , tb_c_b_i.web_thumbnail_url as webThumbnailUrl from web_app_test2.tb_comic_book as tb_c_b inner join web_app_test2.tb_comic_book_thumbnail_img as tb_c_b_i on tb_c_b.r_book_no = tb_c_b_i.r_book_no where tb_c_b.use_yn = 'y' and date_format(tb_c_b.book_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') > #{startDt} and date_format(tb_c_b.book_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') < #{endDt} limit 10

/* 전체 만화책 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_c_b.r_book_no as bookNo , tb_c_b.m_n_no as madeNatureNo , tb_c_b.title as comicBookTitle , tb_c_b.author as comicBookAuthor , tb_c_b.link as link , tb_c_b_i.web_thumbnail_url as webThumbnailUrl , tb_c_b.serial_state as comicBookSerialStateEnum , date_format(tb_c_b.book_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as comicBookRegDt , date_format(tb_c_b.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_comic_book as tb_c_b inner join web_app_test2.tb_comic_book_thumbnail_img as tb_c_b_i on tb_c_b.r_book_no = tb_c_b_i.r_book_no where tb_c_b.use_yn = 'y' order by tb_c_b.reg_dt desc

/* 단일 만화책 상세 정보 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_c_b.r_book_no as bookNo , tb_c_b.m_n_no as madeNatureNo , tb_c_b.title as comicBookTitle , tb_c_b.author as comicBookAuthor , tb_c_b.link as link , tb_c_b.serial_state as comicBookSerialStateEnum , tb_c_b.use_yn as comicBookUseYnEnum , ifnull(tb_c_b_v.viewCnt, 0) as viewCnt , tb_c_b_i.web_thumbnail_url as webThumbnailUrl , date_format(tb_c_b.book_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as comicBookRegDt , date_format(tb_c_b.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_comic_book as tb_c_b inner join web_app_test2.tb_comic_book_thumbnail_img as tb_c_b_i on tb_c_b.r_book_no = tb_c_b_i.r_book_no left outer join () as tb_c_b_v on tb_c_b.r_book_no = tb_c_b_v.r_book_no where tb_c_b.use_yn = 'y' and tb_c_b.r_book_no = #{bookNo}
